HEA_composition.composition: The atomic ratio of Pt:Ru:Mo:Fe:Co:Ni is 17.3:17.0:17.4:16.0:5.9:8.1
HEA_composition.support: Vulcan XC-72R carbon (100 mg PtRu cm⁻²)

synthesis.precursors: No specific precursors or their exact amounts were mentioned

solution.dispersant: TEG stabilizes the HEA-QDs and prevents uncontrolled enlargement

reaction_conditions.post_synthesis: washed and vacuum-dried at room temperature

lattice_constants_A.note: Lattice constant of HEA-QDs is between Pt (3.92 Å) and Ru (3.80 Å), consistent with Vegard's law

XRD.Vegard_law_observation: Lattice constant increases linearly with metal composition

XPS.metal_states: Pt0 4f, Ru0 3p, Mo, Fe, Co, Ni

HAXPES.VB_spectrum: Broad and featureless, consistent with multielement composition

reaction_mechanism: The enhanced electron density from the surrounding metals (Fe, Co, Ni, Mo) weakens the H adsorption strength, thereby improving Tafel kinetics.
